DummyErrorStorage
DeprecatedTransactionalStoragesJDBC

It is no longer necessary to use the DummyTransactionalStorage

Since: 7.8.0

Class for a messageLog element to be used in combination with a MessageStoreSender who's messages are processed by a MessageStoreListener.
See also
Github - DummyErrorStorage Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.jdbc.DummyTransactionalStorage
Syntax
Copy
<DummyErrorStorage />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
slotId	text	-
Set the slotId, an identifier to keep separate the messages inserted by different JdbcTransactionalStorage instances.
This field is optional, unless the attribute onlyStoreWhenMessageIdUniqu is set to true.
type	text	E for errorStorage on Receiver
A for messageLog on Receiver
L for messageLog on Pipe
Possible values are E (error store), M (me
